summary: THE CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL# 94V130000 IN 1994. HE CONTACTED THE LOCAL DEALER SEVERAL TIMES REGARDING A REMEDY. AT FIRST THE DEALER WAS NOT AWARE OF A RECALL AND THEN THEY SAID THEY DID NOT HAVE THE NECESSARY KIT.  IN 1998, CONSUMER RECEIVED A REMINDER REGARDING THE RECALL FROM FREIGHTLINER AND CONTACTED THE DEALER WHO STATED THEY WOULD RESEARCH AND CALL BACK.  CONSUMER STILL HAS NOT HEARD FROM THE DEALER AND THE RECALL REMAINED OPEN.  VEHICLE IS A 1987 SUNVISTA 34FT MOTOR HOME.            *JB  FUEL PUMP AND PARKING BRAKE FAILED AS A RESULT OF THE RECALL.        *TT  *JB
